short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: chrome extension for website monitor and controller

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Monitrol - Website Monitor And Controller.

Track how much time you spend on each site each day, and present statistics in a useful and intuitive way. You can set daily access restrictions for websites and block them when they expire.

The Monitrol extension does not track any information about you, nor does it send data anywhere. Chrome local storage is used to save your usage data in a simple format.

If you have feedback or would like to report an issue, please contact the developer, Thanks !

Email: imseantang@gmail.com

------

Data Statictics:
✅ Today overview
✅ Yesterday overview
✅ Week overview
✅ Month overview

Features:
✅ Total time spent browsing
✅ All Sites info browsing

Coming Soon:
